snippet: One reason Republicans are fighting so hard to stop President Obama’s health law now is that it may be impossible to do so once it is established.
abstract: Political Memo holds that one reason Republicans are fighting so hard to stop Pres Obama’s Affordable Care Act may be that it will be impossible to do so once it is established and fully implemented.
lead_paragraph: One reason Republicans are fighting so hard to stop President Obama’s health law now is that it may be impossible to do so once it is established.

headline.main: Fighting to Stop an Entitlement Before It Takes Hold, and Expands
headline.print_headline: Fighting to Stop an Entitlement Before It Takes Hold, and Expands

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
